concept.title: 222.1310 Solicitation provision and contract clauses.

conbody.p: (a)(1) Use of the clause at FAR 52.222-35, Equal Opportunity for Veterans, with its paragraph (c), Listing Openings, also satisfies the requirement of 10 U.S.C. 2410k.
